sentences: The decision (FCCC/CP/2004/L.10) states that the report on the assessment of funding necessary to assist developing countries in fulfilling their commitments under the UNFCCC shall constitute an input of the COP to the fourth replenishment negotiations of the GEF Trust Fund.

It urges the GEF to make adequate funding available to developing countries to meet their commitments under the UNFCCC, and requests the Secretariat to compile information on future investment needs of developing countries for the purpose of fulfilling their commitments and make it available to SBI-23.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
